project_abstract.cdata: The proceeds of the Industrial Finance Project will be onlent, through a specially created Apex Development Finance Unit (ADFU) in the Central Bank, to accredited financial institutions, PFIs, to finance economically and financially viable projects in the industrial sector. Apart from resource transfer, the project would support the Government's financial and industrial reforms and would assist a wider number of financial institutions, including commercial banks, to participate in development projects and provide term financing.
